section.title: Who am I?
section.p: My name is Yves Zoundi and I come from Burkina Faso. I work as a programer analyst at Universite Laval Library in Canada. My daily work involves Java technologies and XML. After being seen as a microsoft employee/advocate for a long time, now most people think I am an Open source/Unix only guy...
You can contact me at yveszoundi at users DOT sf DOT net.

section.title: My blog
section.p: I have a blog hosted at http://yveszoundi.blogspot.com. I talk about XPontus, Java, not really about how I feel.
